title: Divine Freaks
description: Hey, I'm Kitty Slade. Just your average, normal girl, doing, you know, normal stuff. Got a brother (annoying), a sister (quite annoying) and a grandma (she's awesome). Oh yeah, and one more thing. I can see dead people." When a ghost turns up in her biology classroom, only one thing's for sure - Kitty Slade's life is about to get freaky...
author: Fiona Dunbar
